Member Function Documentation

void CServerConnect::OnServerHostnameResolved ( void *  socket,
uint32  ip 
)

Called when a socket has been DNS resolved.

Parameters:
socket The socket object requesting DNS resolution.
ip The found IP, or zero on error.

Note that 'socket' may or may not refer to an valid object, and should be checked before being used.
